title: An Endless Story
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>....and that’s how my play went with Yoshiko-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Amazing! That’s amazing, Shizuku-chan! I think my image of angels has just changed~. So angels aren’t just full of kindness, huh.... The lines about how she’s cold to the fallen angel Yoshiko-chan because she cared so much about her were soooo coooool~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ehehehe. I-, I’m getting embarrassed if you praise me that much. Besides, this script was only possible with the aid of many people. I also borrowed Umi-san’s help for it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eh!? Umi-chan never said anything about that~! I want to try doing it too~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Really!? I also want to see your acting, Honoka-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>But if I’m doing it, what role do you think I should play?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Let’s see.... Between the angel side and the fallen angel side, which do you prefer, Honoka-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ugh.... That’s a hard question~. Both are appealing, and I also want to be friends with both sides~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Then, how about we talk to Umi-san about it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah, let’s do that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
